channel.title: no POST on Networknoob
channel.description: Recent content in no POST on Networknoob

item.title: New desktop build no POST and random crashes
item.description: Over the xmas break I helped a mate put together a new desktop, consisting of an ASUS PRIME X670-P board, 32gb ram, Ryzen 7 7700 and an MSI Ventus 3x RTX 4080 with an 850w Seasonic PSU in a Fractal case. We assembled the hardware and proceeded to spend a couple of hours trying to work out why it would not POST. No beep codes, no output on the screen. Eventually we started to strip the machine back to nothing but the RAM, when we noticed that removing (unplugging) one of the fans from the Nocturna cooler fans the system proceeded to POST.
